channel.title: Citizens mauled by black mob.. I've lost all hope in our world
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z43QL_fhclY
That black mob has absolutely no mind, they all deserve to die.

item.title: Citizens mauled by black mob.. I've lost all hope in our world
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:16, topic:521189”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=639702.msg4312048#msg4312048 date=1370892875]

What the generic expletive did you just generic expletive ing say about me, you little bitch? I’ll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Navy Seals, and I’ve been involved in numerous secret raids on Al-Quaeda, and I have over 300 confirmed kills. I am trained in [size=13pt]gorilla[/size] warfare and I’m the top sniper in the entire US armed forces. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the generic expletive out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my generic expletive ing words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to me over the Internet? Think again, generic expletive er. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of spies across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life. You’re generic expletive ing dead, kid. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can kill you in over seven hundred ways, and that’s just with my bare hands. Not only am I extensively trained in unarmed combat, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the United States Marine Corps and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little “clever” comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your generic expletive ing tongue. But you couldn’t, you didn’t, and now you’re paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You’re generic expletive ing dead, kiddo.

Actually it’s guerrilla.
[/quote]
Actually it’s copypasta[/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Rix_:

What the generic expletive did you just generic expletive ing say about me, you little bitch? I’ll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Navy Seals, and I’ve been involved in numerous secret raids on Al-Quaeda, and I have over 300 confirmed kills. I am trained in [size=13pt]gorilla[/size] warfare and I’m the top sniper in the entire US armed forces. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the generic expletive out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my generic expletive ing words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to me over the Internet? Think again, generic expletive er. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of spies across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life. You’re generic expletive ing dead, kid. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can kill you in over seven hundred ways, and that’s just with my bare hands. Not only am I extensively trained in unarmed combat, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the United States Marine Corps and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little “clever” comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your generic expletive ing tongue. But you couldn’t, you didn’t, and now you’re paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You’re generic expletive ing dead, kiddo.

item.title: Citizens mauled by black mob.. I've lost all hope in our world
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

What the fuck did you just fucking say about me, you little bitch? I’ll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Navy Seals, and I’ve been involved in numerous secret raids on Al-Quaeda, and I have over 300 confirmed kills. I am trained in gorilla warfare and I’m the top sniper in the entire US armed forces. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the fuck out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my fucking words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to me over the Internet? Think again, fucker. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of spies across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life. You’re fucking dead, kid. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can kill you in over seven hundred ways, and that’s just with my bare hands. Not only am I extensively trained in unarmed combat, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the United States Marine Corps and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little “clever” comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your fucking tongue. But you couldn’t, you didn’t, and now you’re paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You’re fucking dead, kiddo.

Read full topic

item.title: Citizens mauled by black mob.. I've lost all hope in our world
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Bowser jr:

Yes I’ve too lost hope in United States, the police and generic expletive ing Nazis side by side.

side note, can we please stop censoring fuck to "generic expletive " and at the very least change it to something like “████” or “****”? Seeing the word “f___ing” looks ridiculous with the current replacement. At least with █ or an asterisk people would be immediately aware of the filter.
